comment: Had her for regents writing aka most pointless class. I did pass after her class so I give her props. She was kind of...dumb in class. She would ask weird personal questions. Learn easy basic grammar one day and write a practice essay the next day. Not bad at all! Just a waste of time.
She is a very nice lady. I learned a good bit of grammar and writing techniques that I did not know before.
She improve my essays and help me pass the regent's writing section. Now I'll have to do is pass the reading.
Horrible teacher! Very unorganized, runs the class like a high school teacher, assignments unclear, don't take unless necessary!
The class is a complete waste of time and she makes you feel that way.  She is judgmental which i found appalling.  She doesn't always remember what she said in many of the classes.

She is such a sweet lady, however she is  pretty unorganized. She often forgets things she told us. She forgot to give us a quiz and gave us all zeros until we said something. She gets her classes mixed up a lot. She does care about the students but just confuses herself a lot.
Such a sweet lady, be nice to her and the semester will be fun and simple. Take her if you don't want to do anything, total bs class.

She taught her class with clarity, but changed her syllabus many times through out the semester. The key to obtaining an "A" is go to every class, do assignments on times, and read the textbook given.

do NOT take her class! i am not sure it is possible to make an A. all of my grades hinted that i should have one and when i emailed her to fix it she didnt respond. in fact, i dont think anyone got an A in KSU 1101!! she was never on time for class. she gives pop quizzes. i think she meant well.. if only it were enough.

Very sweet older lady and a lot of fun! She's a teacher that will make you life. but you'll be pulling your hair out at the end of the semester bc she crams everything in then. She's not at all clear about assignments. But the class is a joke so there isn't much a prof can do to make it interesting. Props for trying though!
The nicest prof. She is a reall nice lady, she cares about her students and wants to do her best to teach us. The class is easy if you show up. I would take her again

Although this class is required, I don't think it was that bad. No interest to take it at the time, though. She was a good teacher, used the book, and made to write a nine page paper about career, but catch this: I wrote three and still got an A... I just talked to her -- she's very easy to talk to.

I don't even know where to begin with this professor! First of all everyone I know and everyone I have talked to made a C whether they worked their butts off or slacked off (mind you this is KSU 1101.) Her bored tone and corny jokes were excrutiating. I seriously don't even know how she has a job here!

This instructor will forget everything. If she tells you to be somewhere she will forget and show up late claiming she told you something else. Its a fairly easy class you just show up and you practically get an A. There was no real challenge KSU 1101 is a joke class as is.
Very hard to follow, but with notetaking, reading, and ordinary studying, an A is very achievable

Very nice person,stinky teacher.Wasn't good at communicating with the class.Always changed dates and "forgot" to tell us.I was always confused about what was going on.Did a lot of pointless things in the class that no other freshman seminar class did.Enjoyed the books we read.Only used my textbook once. Still have no idea where my grade came from.
Senile. Worst class I've taken ever.She is confused by everything, thinks shes handed out assignments but never did, changes her "sylabus" multiple times.. none were accurate.  DO NOT TAKE HER.
BORING BUT EASY!!! It's not her that is boring...it is the material taught.
wonderful person, kinda dim, forgetfull.  too much emphasis on this easy freshman seminar class being a real credit.

A very sweet nice lady, but is way out there. She forgets many things (tests, names, what you just told her, etc) I felt as if I was in kindergarten again. Bless her heart, she tries hard but... although for birthdays she brings in a cake for everyone! Don't buy any "required books" I guarantee you won't need them and still make an A.

the 1 test we had only had 5 questions and she couldnt word the questions.  she sucks.  she cant hear, she promises us things that never happen, she laughs at her own jokes, she is like 100 years old.
Really random and didn't explain things very well...Try not to get her if you can!

She was so unclear and unorganized, at the beginning of the semester i loved her cause she reminded me of my grandma but then she just got to me.  she forgets everything and never remembers students faces way into the middle of the semester.  she treats us like we are 5 and she CANT remember anything!  that just drove me crazy!  we had no tests.
I've never thought i was smarter than a teacher but she pushing it
Doesn't really make herself clear, she's kinda out there, but she's really sweet and funny

Peg is such a cute teacher! Even though she doesn't know what drafting is, she's funny. We are making over an office and apartment in her class. We do basically nothing in there. We just finished watching "Rudy." When it's someone's birthday, she brings cakes!! It's funny
Help me pass a test that i thought would be almost impossible.
